resources.string: this allows hugo to collect location data even when the app is closed or not in use in order to notify you when you approach the selected stop.\n\nhugo will notify you via a notification and alert tone. You can turn it off at any point from the notification bar.

hugo uses your location data even when the app is closed or not in use to show your closest stops, suggest better places to go to or from when planning a journey and to notify you when to get off the bus if selected.
